question_sentence: “Jeopardy!” has announced two new hosts: the show’s executive producer, Mike Richards, and:
This marine animal is aroused by chemicals found in plastic, scientists reported:
Toxic invasive poison hemlock is spreading into U.S. parks and backyard gardens, officials warn. Which of the following is hemlock?
True or false: Bosses may charge employees who haven’t been vaccinated against COVID-19 more for health insurance.
The content of a 1,000-year-old grave in Finland has led researchers to believe it may have belonged to:
Pepsi and Boston Beer Co. are teaming up to create which drink?
Kathy Hochul, who will replace Andrew Cuomo as New York’s governor in in less than two weeks, will be the state’s first:
choices: Governor to have previously been a member of Congress
Governor to take office in a non-election year

question_sentence: MLB planned to play a game inspired by which iconic baseball movie?
Which European city may have just broken the continent’s heat record?
Researchers say they found fossils of the closest “real-life” version of which creature?
Who is set to become the first female governor of New York following the resignation of Andrew Cuomo this week amid sexual harassment allegations?
A European record-high temperature of 48.8C was provisionally reported where this week?
What percentage of A-level students achieved the equivalent of an A or A* this year?
Campaigners are protesting against a death warrant issued to Geronimo the alpaca by the government after the camelid twice tested positive for which disease?
Prince Andrew joined the Queen at which royal residence after being served with a lawsuit accusing him of sexual abuse?
Footballer Lionel Messi has signed with which club following his departure from FC Barcelona after 21 years?
Which UK city is the least affordable in which to buy a new home, according to a newly released survey?
Newly released NHS England data shows the number of patients waiting to start hospital treatment has reached a record total of how much?
Britney Spears’ father has reportedly agreed to step down as her conservator after controlling her finances for how many years?
Saudi Arabia has agreed to allow Covid-vaccinated foreign visitors to join an initial monthly total of how many people making the Umrah pilgrimage to Mecca?
The Tokyo 2020 Olympics may be over, but the 2022 Winter Games are now less than six months away. Where will they be held?
evidence: The 2022 Winter Games are scheduled to take place in Beijing, China from February 4 to 20. It will be the first city in history to have hosted both the Summer and Winter Olympics.

question_sentence: The Department of Justice is set to review previously withheld information about this major US event, with the intent of eventually releasing some of the information to the public. What event does the review cover?
evidence: The review is looking at previously withheld information on the 9/11 terrorist attacks and releasing it to the public.

question_sentence: The Dixie Fire, which has currently scorched more than 500,000 acres of land, is chiefly located in which state?
evidence: The is concentrated in California, and is the second largest fire in the states history, according to CalFire.

question_sentence: What iconic European site’s operations had to be temporarily halted this week due to a “technical failure?”
evidence: London’s Tower Bridge was temporarily stuck open due to a “technical failure,” blocking the crossing of traffic and pedestrians on the iconic landmark.

question_sentence: The United Nations’ Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) released a dire report on the state of global warming. What does the report cite as the driver of the climate crisis?
choices: a blend of human activity and natural causes
natural changes that occur over time
evidence: The IPCC report, written by over 200 scientists and covering around 3,500 pages, puts the blame squarely on human greenhouse gas emissions, dismissing the debate over whether the crisis is natural or man-made.

question_sentence: The US Senate passed a bipartisan $1.2 trillion infrastructure bill. Shortly after, Senate Democrats approved a budget resolution solely along party lines. How much is the current price tag for the budget resolution?
evidence: The final budget resolution, a sweeping economic package that includes expanding the social safety net in the United States, totals $3.5 trillion.

question_sentence: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo announced his plans to resign amid fallout from a sexual harassment scandal and damning report from the state’s attorney general. Who will take over the governorship?
choices: Carl Heastie, Speaker of the NY State Assembly
Bill de Blasio, Mayor of New York City
evidence: In accordance with the state’s line of succession, Kathy Hochul, New York’s Lieutenant Governor, will assume the position. She will be the first female ever to lead the state as governor.

question_sentence: The beloved game show “Jeopardy!” is coming back for a new season starting September 13. What will make this season unique?
choices: it will be available only online
it will have an interactive VR component
it will be renamed in honor of the late Alex Trebek
evidence: The new season of “Jeopardy” will have not one, but two hosts. Executive producer Mike Richards was named the official new host, with actress Mayim Bialik hosting “primetime and spinoff series.”

question_sentence: The long-awaited results of the 2020 Census have been released. Which of the below is not true in the US, based on this new data?
choices: growth mostly occurred around big cities
evidence: The 2020 Census concluded that the adult population grew since the last Census, with adults now making up 78% of the total population, up from 76%. The results also showed that the United States is more diverse than ever before.

question_sentence: Following months of public pressure, this person says they will be stepping down as conservator of pop icon Britney Spears’ estate. Who is it?
evidence: Jamie Spears, Britney Spears’ father, has filed paperwork to step down as conservator of the singer’s estimated $60 million fortune.
